name: Rick Dé
profileSummary: Architect turned Product Designer with 10+ years of experience in architecture and 5+ years in tech.
Expertise in user research, user experience (UX) design, and user interface (UI) design.
Experience in 3D art and animation, metaverse product design, architecture, and multifaceted design.
Adept at web development, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and SvelteKit.
Proficient in Blender, Figma, and Svelte.
A proven track record of designing successful products that meet the needs of users and businesses.
Adept at working cross-functionally with engineers, product managers, and stakeholders to bring products to market.
Passionate about creating products that make a positive impact on the world.
Adapted design thinking and visual design principles to create innovative and user-centered products.
Leverages technology to design new and innovative digital experiences.

significantProjects.details: Designed letscollect.io, a NFT crowdfunding platform for movies, which resulted in creating the World’s First NFT crowd-funded Bollywood Movie. Now streaming on Disney + Hotstar.
Product Design and Management of an NFT marketplace and WEB3 social media platform.
Solving supply chain and designing an app for an organic fertilizer manufacturing industry, improving manufacturer and consumer interaction systems.
Designing an innovative LMS, ERP, and CRM for schools and educational institutes.

details: Led product design for a company that provided web3 and metaverse services to other industries and B2B companies.
Designed and rendered 3D models of virtual spaces and objects that were visually stunning and engaging.
Designed user interfaces and digital products for diverse client web apps and platforms, resulting in a 10% increase in user engagement.
Designed and developed a virtual meta theater for GSP, offering realistic and engaging live performances.
Crafted a metaverse product for a cultural showcase for the first Durga Puja on the metaverse.
Designed Versez, a customizable metaverse platform for virtual worlds, for B2B clients as a PAAS product.

Designed and created Spatial Environments for multiple Architecture, Interior, and Landscape projects, with a focus on 3D Visualisation, Visual Design, Identity & Experience building, created the website for the firm, social media account, and established web presence.

otherExperience.position: Assistant Professor for Architecture & UI/UX Design
details: Along with teaching architecture and UI/UX design, designed their annual magazine and led the website design team.
Along with teaching architecture and UI/UX design, designed their prospectus, part of the innovation department, designed events and spaces, 3D design.

otherExperience.position: Architect, Designer for designing built environment for apartments, factories etc
details: Architect, designing bungalows, apartments, factories, etc.
Intern Architect and designer for the pioneer of landscape architecture in India. Along with designing architecture and landscape, created the first website of the firm, and established web presence.

skills: Design Thinking for Problem Solving & Strategy Design
Story Telling, Effective Visual Communication & Collaboration
Web3, Smart Contracts, Metaverse Building & NFT Creation
AI and Prompt Generation for Generative AI

education.institution: School of Architecture and Landscape Design, Shri Mata Vaishno Devi University
